title: Sometimes Never
description: The first second after midnight. Bartholomew's conclusion was that the accumulative effect of his thoughts was much too vague. He needed to focus more. After a recent serious illness, focusing on his lack of focus was the only thing he really could focus on; or so it would seem. Three seconds after midnight. A connection had been made with a visitor from outer space. One Henry Lloyd. A being who could best be described as a grant slug with five eyes stuck on the front of his head. A body 20 metres long; weighing in at 500 kilograms. The Antarctic was the only place where he d been while visiting the planet. Word had it, the scientists he met there had been effected. Somehow.
author: GX Jupitter-Larsen
